CustomField.description: To track the impact of LinkedIn on the Account. New Account means that the rep created a new Account as a direct result of LinkedIn activities. Influenced Account means that the Account already existed in Salesforce, but the rep has engaged with them through LinkedIn.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: New Account = a new Account as a direct result of LinkedIn activities. Influenced Account = the Account already existed in Salesforce, but the rep has engaged with them through LinkedIn.
CustomField.label: LinkedIn Navigator
